MORe Implementation Issues

  • Measure Framework
    • Scheduling

Measure Framework

Some Measure calculations are based on the JUNG library. Sonivis implementation are not suitable because Graph-classes are not compatible with JUNG and sonivis follows another concept of nodes that reference a network.

Network-measures are stored at a central registry

  1. Data could be queried without java reference on the network object (by network name)
  2. No requirements for network objects

Scheduling

Scheduling parameter can be defined in the measure's param map. An instance of MoreScheduler is responsible for scheduling measure actions.
